Text: how do i convert or play this i am not familiar with mkv

@violentretardman Well for PC: 

http://www.videolan.org/vlc/



"It plays everything!"

The media player that fulfills all your needs. It handles DVDs, (S)VCDs, Audio CDs, web streams, TV cards and much more.

With VLC, there is no need to continually update many different codec packs. VLC comes with nearly every codec built in!

And whats more, VLC can play back your files, even if the media is damaged! Missing or broken pieces wont stop VLC. All the video and audio information that remains can be played. 


Best Regards !
/Zen_bud :)

Haven't watched it all yet but quality of audio & video are both great - 10/10
And thanks to whoever was seeding - pretty much 1MBps the whole time :)
Ignore my last comment - the download was fast but after watching on PS3 through a HDTV and a 27" iMac you can tell the audio is very... just bad, and the video could be a lot better.
